noun.description: A dog of a breed (of which there are several varieties) with a curly coat that is often ornamentally clipped. Poodle breeds are classified by size.
A person or organization who is overly willing to obey another.
examples: the council is being made a poodle of central government

origin: Early 19th century: from German Pudel(hund), from Low German pud(d)eln splash in water (the poodle being a water-dog).
